text: aur tum mat banao, rasool ke pukaarane ko, paraspar ek-doosare ko pukaarane jaisa[1], allaah tumamen se unhen jaanata hai, jo sarak jaate hain, ek-doosare kee aad lekar. to unhen saavadhaan rahana chaahie, jo aapake aadesh ka virodh karate hain ki unapar koee aapada aa pade athava unapar koee duhkhadaayee yaatana aa jaaye
